{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Akitio-mycloud-mini-angle.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Personal Cloud Server |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.akitio.com/network-storage/mycloud-mini |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = AKiTio_MyCloud_Mini |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = AKiTio |model = MyCloud |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Mini |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = AK-MCS-LN2SPS |page_start_date = 09/27/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AKiTio_MyCloud_Mini |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = PLX Technology;NAS7821; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = 11MP |cpu1spd = 750 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;HY27UF082G2B-TPCB; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5PS1G831CFP-S6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211D; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:01:D2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.2;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.14;Fedora release 12;
|exp_if_types = SATA, eSATA, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.35 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J7 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup |addchip = 8-bit OTP Microcontroller;Holtek;HT48R05A-1;;1;,,, Serial Real Time Clock;STMicroelectronics;M41T0;;1;,,, 2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;CYStech Electronics;MTB20N03Q8;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Positive Regulator;Linear Technology;LT1117;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = inXtron |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 610074719892 |ean = 4715104310035 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00R5ZW358 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B005XDGJB8 |asin_country2 = DE |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MP-LN23P-RS-V1.01" and "E10-70G4153002" are silkscreened on the board in FCC photos.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[PLX Technology]]'' NAS7821 ARM11MPCore (@750MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 256MB SLC NAND Flash, 1x SATA, 1x eSATA *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 5V, 2A via barrel
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/akitio/akitio_mycloud_mini |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = oxnas |subtarget = ox820 |arch = arm_mpcore |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Akitio-mycloud-mini-angle.jpg| File:Akitio-mycloud-mini-rear.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:AKiTio MyCloud Mini Top.jpeg|Board Top File:AKiTio MyCloud Mini Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:AKiTio MyCloud Mini Aux.jpeg|Auxillary Board </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== *[[AKiTiO Thunder3 10G (T3NA)]] - Thunder3 10G Network Adapter • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/11526/akitio-displays-thunderbolt-3-to-10gbe-adapter PR] :Thunderbolt 3 ([[Intel]]/[[Aquantia]] ??), 10GbE RJ-45, 1G/2.5G/5G/10G *[[AKiTiO Thunder3 Duo Pro (T3DP)]] - Thunder3 & USB 3.1 DAS • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/10248/thunderbolt-3-in-action-akitio-thunder3-duo-pro-das-review Review] :2x Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C), 1x USB 3.1 Gen 1, DisplayPort 1.1 • [https://www.akitio.com/desktop-storage/thunder3-duo-pro PPage] *[[AKiTiO Thunder3 PCIe SSD (T3PC)]] - Thunder3 PCIe SSD DAS • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/10396/akitio-thunder3-pcie-ssd-thunderbolt-das-review Review] :2x Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C), PCIe 3.0 x4 NVMe, DisplayPort 1.1 • [https://www.akitio.com/expansion/thunder3-pcie-ssd PPage] *[[AKiTiO Thunder3 PCIe Box (T3PB)]] - Thunder3 PCIe Box DAS • [https://www.akitio.com/expansion/thunder3-pcie-box PPage] :2x Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C), PCIe 3.0 x4 (x16), DisplayPort 1.1
